text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically requires the response to state that for tax years beginning after December 31, 2024, interest deductibility under \u00a7163(j) is calculated based on EBITDA (i.e., the calculation includes an add-back for depreciation and amortization).
